ref: 10784 rúpyati1 ʻ suffers acute pain in belly ʼ TBr. [rōpáyati1 ʻ causes acute pain ʼ AV.: < ʻ *pierces, is pierced ʼ (semant. cf. śūˊla -- ) and same as *rupyati2. -- √rup]
Pa. ruppati ʻ is hurt, oppressed (by illness or pain) ʼ, ruppana -- n. ʻ the being so hurt ʼ;
P. rupṇā ʻ to fly into a passion ʼ.
